title: Lady B
itunes:title: Lady B
description:
This episode of Questlove Supreme puts the spotlight on a woman whose name should be a part of everyone's hip hop matriculation. Lady B has put in her work for the culture from being the first DJ to play hip hop on FM radio, to being the first female MC to record on wax and not only did she put Philadelphia on to hip hop, she made it a top five market for the genre! This is a rare sit down with a true foremother of hip hop, the Legendary Lady B.... without a doubt!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
